```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(here)
source(here("Tandem.R"))
# run Tandem with given arguments
Waits <- Tandem(Starting.seed = 12345,c=c(1,1),Tend=50)
```

## Week 1 Assessment

### Average queue time

Average queue time is `r mean(Waits$Waits1)` and `r mean(Waits$Waits2)` for queues 1 and 2 respectively.

### Plot Waiting times

```{r}
plot(1:length(Waits$Waits1),Waits$Waits1)
plot(1:length(Waits$Waits2),Waits$Waits2)
```

### Record Sample Path

```{r}
Tandem(Starting.seed = 12345,c=c(1,1),Tend=50)
```
